name: fuse-ui
description: Token-first, adapter-driven release engine that turns design intent into reviewed, versioned UI code packages

scripts.fuseui:test: docker compose run --rm web pnpm test && docker compose run --rm server pnpm test
scripts.publish-packages:cli: pnpm --filter @fuseui-org/cli publish --no-git-checks --access public || pnpm --filter @fuseui-org/cli publish --no-git-checks --access public --force
scripts.publish-packages:sdk: pnpm --filter @fuseui-org/sdk publish --no-git-checks --access public || pnpm --filter @fuseui-org/sdk publish --no-git-checks --access public --force
scripts.publish-packages:dry-run: pnpm --filter @fuseui-org/cli publish --dry-run --no-git-checks --access public && pnpm --filter @fuseui-org/sdk publish --dry-run --no-git-checks --access public
